blogPost.excerpt: Opal is your go-to app for Digital Wellbeing. Join thousands of people saving time daily, experiencing more productivity, better sleep, lower stress, and better focus each day. Use Opal to disconnect distractions from your phone & focus on what matters to you.
blogPost.body: Opal is your go-to app for Digital Wellbeing. Join thousands of people saving time daily, experiencing more productivity, better sleep, lower stress, and better focus each day. Use Opal to disconnect distractions from your phone & focus on what matters to you.
blogPost.title: Opal - Take control of your phone 💎📲
blogPost.author: Amrith Shanbhag

localize.description: Opal是您的数字健康应用的首选。加入成千上万的人的行列，每天节省时间，体验更高的生产力、更好的睡眠、更低的压力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，让你从手机中解脱出来，专注于对你来说最重要的事情。
Opal是您的數字健康應用的首選。加入成千上萬的人的行列，每天節省時間，體驗更高的生產力、更好的睡眠、更低的壓力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，讓你從手機中解脫出來，專注於對你來說最重要的事情。

previous.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
previous.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。

next.excerpt: • Check your latest website data in your menu bar • Number next to the Menu Bar Analytics icon shows the User visits in the current day • Use tabs to switch between 11 metrics • Google Analytics metrics are updated every 5min • Price $4.99 one-time
next.title: Menu Bar Analytics for macOS - Check your Google Analytics data from your Mac's menu bar

localize.description: - 在菜单栏中查看最新的网站数据 - 菜单栏分析图标旁边的数字显示了当日的用户访问量 - 使用标签在11个指标之间切换 - Google Analytics指标每5分钟更新一次 - 一次性价格为4.99美元。
localize.tagline: 从Mac的菜单栏查看Google Analytics数据

localize.description: - 在菜單欄中查看最新的網站數據 - 菜單欄分析圖標旁邊的數字顯示了當日的用戶訪問量 - 使用標籤在11個指標之間切換 - Google Analytics指標每5分鐘更新一次 - 一次性價格爲4.99美元。
localize.tagline: 從Mac的菜單欄查看Google Analytics數據
